column4: hey dudes... i have no sound here, and im getting this message, while i try to install my sound driver "install: 102: alsaconf: not found"
change sound system to pulse in sound config may help
it says that its already installed. But i think thats someting missing on "alsa-utils" ,cause it says to install a "curses" lib.
sounds like a line of investigation
im trying to install AC' 97 drivers..
it's a fresh install. It came with i740 intel driver installed, but i wanna know if i can install i965 driver, since i have a gma 950 graphic card
i've just installed by apt-get install chromium-browser
i've already tryied configuring my proxy by dconf-tools as well
if you make a new user, is it ok?
i think it may be some kind of dns problem. I'm on ubuntu 64 bit
